name: Adventure Game
detailed_description:
A VR game: solve fun puzzles, explore ancient dungeons, and fight wicked bests to uncover the mystery of a strange world; an island from where there is no escape, not even death. Who brought you here and why? Are all your struggles just entertainment for someone?

Features:
-Motion controller hover locomotion
-Several dungeons across an island
-Traditional action RPG puzzles
-Traditional fantasy monsters such as slimes, skeletons, orcs, and mimics
